questions.question_text:
You need to model a relationship between the account entity and the contact entity to track the advisory board members of accounts.
You need to use connections to model the relationship between the account and contact entities.
What should you do?

choices.A: Create a one-to-many (1:N) relationship between the account and contact entities, and then use two connection roles to represent each side of the new 1:N relationship.
choices.C: Use two connection roles to represent each side of the relationship.
choices.D: Create a many-to-many (N:N) relationship between the account and contact entities, and then use two connection roles to represent each side of the new N:N
choices.B: Create a connection entity, and then use two connection roles to represent each entity in the relationship.
